mapper.select: SELECT Z.id, Z.zhengZhi, Z.zuZhi, Z.daoDe, Z.lvXingYiWu, Z.moFan, ifnull(Z.zhengZhi, 0) + ifnull(Z.zuZhi,0) + ifnull(Z.daoDe,0) + ifnull(Z.lvXingYiWu,0) + ifnull(Z.moFan, 0) as total, Z.problem, Z.lastModifiedTime, U.name, U.realName FROM ZuZhiPingJia Z RIGHT JOIN User U on U.name=Z.userName where U.organization = #{organization} and U.branch=#{branch};
mapper.insert:
Insert into ZuZhiPingJia (userName, realName, zhengZhi, zuZhi, daoDe, lvXingYiWu, moFan, total, problem, lastModifiedTime) values
(#{item.userName}, #{item.realName}, #{item.zhengZhi},#{item.zuZhi},#{item.daoDe}, #{item.lvXingYiWu},#{item.moFan}, #{item.total}, #{item.problem}, #{item.lastModifiedTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE Z FROM ZuZhiPingJia Z JOIN User U on Z.userName=U.name WHERE U.organization=#{organization} and U.branch=#{branch}
mapper.select: SELECT Z.id, Z.siXiang, Z.daoDe, Z.xueXi, Z.gongZuo, Z.shengHuo, ifnull(Z.siXiang, 0) + ifnull(Z.daoDe, 0) + ifnull(Z.xueXi, 0) + ifnull(Z.gongZuo, 0) + ifnull(Z.shengHuo, 0) as total, Z.problem, Z.lastModifiedTime, U.name, U.realName FROM QunZhongPingYi Z RIGHT JOIN User U on U.name=Z.userName where U.organization = #{organization} and U.branch=#{branch};
mapper.insert:
Insert into QunZhongPingYi (userName, realName, siXiang, daoDe, xueXi, gongZuo, shengHuo, total, problem, lastModifiedTime) values
(#{item.userName}, #{item.realName}, #{item.siXiang},#{item.daoDe},#{item.xueXi}, #{item.gongZuo},#{item.shengHuo}, #{item.total}, #{item.problem}, #{item.lastModifiedTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE Z FROM QunZhongPingYi Z JOIN User U on Z.userName=U.name WHERE U.organization=#{organization} and U.branch=#{branch}
mapper.select: select User.name, User.realName, ROUND(ifnull(POINT.gongxing, 0)/1.5) gongxing, ROUND(ifnull(POINT.gexing, 0)/1.5) gexing, ROUND(ifnull(POINT.gongxing, 0))/1.5 + ROUND(ifnull(POINT.gexing, 0))/1.5 total, ZiPing.problem, ZiPing.lastModifiedTime from ( select FINAL_1.name, FINAL_1.realName, SUM(FINAL_1.gongxing) gongxing, SUM(FINAL_1.gexing) gexing from ( select FINAL.name, FINAL.realName, CASE When FINAL.propertyName=0 Then option_point Else 0 End as gongxing, CASE When FINAL.propertyName=1 Then option_point Else 0 End as gexing from ( select UQPI.name, UQPI.realName, CASE When UP.name='共性' Then 0 Else 1 End as propertyName, UQPI.point * count(UQPI.point) option_point from ( select UQI.name, UQI.realName, PQ.user_property_id, PO.point from ( select PS.name, PS.realName, PI.question_id, PI.option_id from ( select U.name, U.realName, P.id, P.paper_id from PaperScore P Join User U on U.name=P.scorer and U.name=P.scoree where U.branch=#{branch} and U.organization=#{organization} ) PS Join PaperItemScore PI on PI.score_id=PS.id ) UQI Join PaperQuestion PQ on UQI.question_id=PQ.id Join PaperOption PO on PO.id=UQI.option_id ) UQPI Join UserProperty UP on UP.id = UQPI.user_property_id group by name, propertyName, point ) FINAL ) FINAL_1 group by FINAL_1.name, FINAL_1.realName ) POINT RIGHT JOIN User on User.name=POINT.name LEFT JOIN ZiPing on ZiPing.userName=User.name where User.branch=#{branch} and User.organization=#{organization}
mapper.insert:
Insert into ZiPing (userName, realName, total, problem, lastModifiedTime) values
(#{item.userName}, #{item.realName}, #{item.total}, #{item.problem}, #{item.lastModifiedTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE Z FROM ZiPing Z JOIN User U on Z.userName=U.name WHERE U.organization=#{organization} and U.branch=#{branch}
mapper.insert:
Insert into HuPing (userName, realName, total, problem, lastModifiedTime) values
(#{item.userName}, #{item.realName}, #{item.total}, #{item.problem}, #{item.lastModifiedTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE Z FROM HuPing Z JOIN User U on Z.userName=U.name WHERE U.organization=#{organization} and U.branch=#{branch}
mapper.select: select U.name, U.realName, ZiPing.total ziPing, HuPing.total huPing, QunZhongPingYi.total qunZhongPing, ZuZhiPingJia.total zuZhiPing, ifnull(ZiPing.total, 0)*0.2 + ifnull(HuPing.total, 0)*0.25 + ifnull(QunZhongPingYi.total, 0)*0.25 + ifnull(ZuZhiPingJia.total, 0)*0.3 total, DeFenHuiZong.hongxian, DeFenHuiZong.jianKang, DeFenHuiZong.lastModifiedTime from User U left join ZiPing on U.name = ZiPing.userName left join HuPing on U.name = HuPing.userName left join QunZhongPingYi on U.name = QunZhongPingYi.userName left join ZuZhiPingJia on U.name = ZuZhiPingJia.userName left join DeFenHuiZong on U.name = DeFenHuiZong.userName where U.organization=#{organization} and U.branch=#{branch}
mapper.insert:
Insert into DeFenHuiZong (userName, realName, hongXian, jianKang, lastModifiedTime) values
(#{item.userName}, #{item.realName}, #{item.hongXian}, #{item.jianKang}, #{item.lastModifiedTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE Z FROM DeFenHuiZong Z JOIN User U on Z.userName=U.name WHERE U.organization=#{organization} and U.branch=#{branch}
mapper.select: select U.name, U.realName, ifnull(ZiPing.total, 0)*0.2 + ifnull(HuPing.total, 0)*0.25 + ifnull(QunZhongPingYi.total, 0)*0.25 + ifnull(ZuZhiPingJia.total, 0)*0.3 deFen, DeFenHuiZong.hongxian, DeFenHuiZong.jianKang tiJian, BaoGaoDan.problem, BaoGaoDan.tiGao, BaoGaoDan.lastModifiedTime from User U left Join ZiPing on U.name = ZiPing.userName left join HuPing on U.name = HuPing.userName left join QunZhongPingYi on U.name = QunZhongPingYi.userName left join ZuZhiPingJia on U.name = ZuZhiPingJia.userName left join DeFenHuiZong on U.name = DeFenHuiZong.userName left join BaoGaoDan on U.name = BaoGaoDan.userName where U.name=#{username}

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from BaoGaoDan where userName = #{username}
insert.if: Insert into BaoGaoDan (userName, realName, problem, tiGao, lastModifiedTime) values (#{baoGaoDan.userName}, #{baoGaoDan.realName}, #{baoGaoDan.problem}, #{baoGaoDan.tiGao}, #{baoGaoDan.lastModifiedTime} )
